answers.answer: This is my third pregnancy and have yet to have any morning sickness.  Be thankful that we are some of the lucky ones!!
I'm glad to hear that I haven't gone to the doctors yet because I don't have insurance at this point. So I'm glad to hear you are the same with no morning sickness
I had none during my first pregnancy but this time is different  :)
You had absolutely none durring your first?
I had nothing during my first, second and so far on my third.... yay me!!
I'm sorry if I sound stupid but from the answers you ladies have posted it is ok to not have morning sickness and it is possible to not get it at all durring my pregnancy?

That is correct Danni... not every woman is going to have every symptom in their pregnancy, some have very few, and some get all.  Every woman will carry their baby different from others, and most pregnancies can be different from the first as well.For instance, with my first I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes, but didn't have it with my second.  It all depends.Just know that your body is creating life right now and take it all in!!!

Thank you so much. :) my boyfriend was being so cute last night he lifted up my shirt and was kissing my belly telling the baby that he loves it and telling me that he loves me. It was so cute I couldn't help but cry. I'm so glad I don't feel sick so I can enjoy the rarity of him being this cute :)
There is one way to see it!!!I am so happy for you and your growing family!
Thank you congrats to you too

question: I am 8 weeks and 2 days. Is it normal that I have had absolutely no morning sickness? I still have the soar breats and fatigue and my emotions are all out of wack but I expected to be so sick since my mom was with me and my brother.
title: Morning sickness
